class.name: TextServerAdvanced
class.brief_description: An advanced text server with support for BiDi, complex text layout, and contextual OpenType features. Used in Godot by default.
class.description: An implementation of [TextServer] that uses HarfBuzz, ICU and SIL Graphite to support BiDi, complex text layouts and contextual OpenType features. This is Godot's default primary [TextServer] interface.
